subject: Applying for Remote Web Developer, Designer position
preview: Hello Sir/Madam,    Good day!    I am Anna, a Web Developer and Designer. Having seen your agency on a list of Web Designing and Development agencies with available positions, I am writing this email

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hello Sir/Madam,

Good day!

I am Anna, a Web Developer and Designer. Having seen your agency on a list of Web Designing and Development agencies with available positions, I am writing this email to inquire if there are any job opportunities that align with my qualifications.

I have done my Bachelor's degree in the field of Computer Science. I have 6+ years of working experience as a Full-Stack Developer. I have worked with platforms like PHP(along with its frameworks - Laravel, CodeIgniter), WordPress, Shopify, Landing pages, ClickFunnels and significantly more.

I have Developed high end systems, portals as well as CRMs using PHP and its framework Laravel and CodeIgniter

Using WordPress, I have Developed simple to high-end websites using several themes (Flatsome, Astra, Divi, WooCommerce-Ultra-Spencer, etc.), Plugins (Memberium, Learndash, Jetpack, Yoast, etc) and Builders (Elementor, Beaver, Divi, etc.) I can also work on custom coding as per the requirements.

I have created many e-commerce websites in Shopify using themes as well as using liquid code so that I can design dynamic templates and custom features.

I also possess a great eye for design, and this is what I believe separates me from the rest of the competition. To serve this purpose I am known for HTML5/CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript(Angular), jQuery, SAAS, etc.

I have good hands-on Graphic Design tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, Adobe XD, etc. I can work on creating prototypes in Figma or can create a PSD or mock-up which I can further convert to a fully functional website.

I have an intermediate level of experience working with Libraries (MUI, Prime React) and Frameworks (NextJS, NuxtJS) of React. Can work on Node.js API with JWT authentication.

As per the above-mentioned skills, I can say that I can handle Front as well as Backend single handed.

I have good grip over Version Control Systems like GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket to keep the code clean and organized.

For keeping the things properly organized, I prefer to use tasks management tools like Asana, BaseCamp, Trello, Notion, Clickup etc and for better communication I would prefer Slack, Skype, etc.

Process of Work:
Together we will paint the detailed picture of your business, figure out what's important, what we want to achieve and how we would do it.

I work well in teams and on my own. I am hard-working with the ability to organise my own workload effectively and prioritise tasks. With my values of honesty and hard work, I will surely provide you with the best quality of work.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Thanks,
Anna
